872520.name: CONCLUSE - Original Soundtrack
872520.description:
The official CONCLUSE soundtrack.

Including music by: Occams Laser, AvapXia, Elias Luukkanen, Studio Grimm, DaniMari, Reverend TJ McGlinchey, Xythisdi1987, and Clement Pancout.

Track List:

  • 01 - Darkness (Concluse Theme)
  • 02 - Lost (in 1983)
  • 03 - Chill in the Air
  • 04 - Spiral
  • 05 - Falling Deeper
  • 06 - Retro Darkness
  • 07 - Dying Atmosphere
  • 08 - Lost
  • 09 - Twisted Hospital
  • 10 - Spiral (Final Rotation)
  • 11 - Lost (in 1993)
  • 12 - Darkness (Version 2)
  • 13 - Darkness (Instrumental)
  • 14 - Darkness (Original)
  • 15 - A Song for the Dead (Circlebro Theme)
  • 16 - Carolyn
872520.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
